chat.name: Tyler
chat.message: Hey Harry

chat.name: Harrison
chat.message: Sup Ty! Where were you today? No one saw you in school at all.

chat.name: Tyler
chat.message: You'll see soon.

chat.name: Harrison
chat.message: Aw man. Did you get into something crazy?

chat.name: Tyler
chat.message: Yeah.

chat.name: Harrison
chat.message: Dude. I think I already know.

chat.name: Tyler
chat.message: Trust me. You don't.

chat.name: Harrison
chat.message: You and April right? Jake looked pretty pissed today.

chat.name: Tyler
chat.message: Nah man. Nothing like that.

chat.name: Harrison
chat.message: Well alright. So you coming over to play some x-box live?

chat.name: Tyler
chat.message: Yeah I'll see you soon.

chat.name: Harrison
chat.message: Did you hear about KP? They say he ran away. His parents came to the school today and they had an assembly for people to come and say if they know where he is.

chat.name: Tyler
chat.message: Scary isn't it...how people keep going missing and no one knows what's happening?

chat.name: Harrison
chat.message: I mean it's just been him but yeah dude it's wild

chat.name: Harrison
chat.message: Hey man it's been almost 3 hours...you still coming?

chat.name: Tyler
chat.message: I'm here.

chat.name: Harrison
chat.message: Where dude? I don't see you.

chat.name: Tyler
chat.message: You're not supposed to yet.

chat.name: Harrison
chat.message: lol stop messing around. Come on. I got pizza.

chat.name: Tyler
chat.message: Your dad just pulled up it's cool. I know he doesn't like me.

chat.name: Tyler
chat.message: I'm out

chat.name: Harrison
chat.message: Alright. See you in chem tomorrow

chat.name: Tyler
chat.message: Hey I saw you in the hall today.

chat.name: Harrison
chat.message: Really? Are you like a ninja? Cause no one has seen you again?

chat.name: Tyler
chat.message: Yeah that's it I'm a ninja. That's how I know you're eating the soup surprise for lunch right now.

chat.name: Harrison
chat.message: Dude come sit with us. I don't see you.

chat.name: Tyler
chat.message: That's cause I don't want you to yet.

chat.name: Harrison
chat.message: You're acting weird bro.

chat.name: Harrison
chat.message: I tried to cover for you in chem. again today. Where were you?

chat.name: Tyler
chat.message: I passed by and just bailed. I saw you sitting next to April though. Moving in on my girl? lol

chat.name: Harrison
chat.message: haha nah you can have her.

chat.name: Tyler
chat.message: Actually I can't, but what I will have is a slice of that stuff crust pizza you have in your bedroom right now.

chat.name: Harrison
chat.message: Dude. WTH

chat.name: Tyler
chat.message: You look scared. Don't be. Hey you were looking a little cold after school today.

chat.name: Harrison
chat.message: Okay this is just creepy. You stole my sweatshirt.

chat.name: Tyler
chat.message: No this is me having a bit of fun. Besides you like using what doesn't belong to you right? lol

chat.name: Harrison
chat.message: Cut it out Ty!

chat.name: Tyler
chat.message: Let's play a game.

chat.name: Harrison
chat.message: X-box live?

chat.name: Tyler
chat.message: No with your mom.

chat.name: Harrison
chat.message: Don't go there.

chat.name: Tyler
chat.message: She's about to walk inside now. She should be careful. It's a bit slippery out there.

chat.name: Harrison
chat.message: Dude my mom really slipped. What did you do?

chat.name: Tyler
chat.message: Do I have your attention now?

chat.name: Harrison
chat.message: Yes!!! What is wrong with you? Why can't you pick up when I answer. Ty is this really you?

chat.name: Tyler
chat.message: Leave your house and make a right. But walk. And don't tell anyone where you're going.

chat.name: Harrison
chat.message: No! You are really starting to tick me off man.

chat.name: Tyler
chat.message: You can't afford to play with me Harrison. Not today. Let's get started.

chat.name: Harrison
chat.message: Unless I see your face and know this is you I'm not doing anything. So back OFF!

chat.name: Tyler
chat.message: Good morning friend ; ) you should be careful today. There are so many bad drivers out there.

chat.name: Harrison
chat.message: Ty I'm going to kick the crap out of you when I see you.

chat.name: Tyler
chat.message: hhmmm we will see about that...but first

chat.name: Harrison
chat.message: Dude alright...alright let me go...this is your trunk I'm in the back of isn't it?

chat.name: Tyler
chat.message: Ssshhhh and stop it with all the kicking. You'll mess up the interior.

chat.name: Harrison
chat.message: Okay please bro. I'm sorry. Whatever I did just let me go. I won't tell anyone I swear.

chat.name: Tyler
chat.message: Calm down. Once you feel the car come to a stop the trunk will automatically open. Get out and walk 50 paces straight then turn right to see your surprise.

chat.name: Harrison
chat.message: Why can't I just go to school and act like everything is normal? Please. This is getting weird now.

chat.name: Tyler
chat.message: Stop your blabbering. Be a man.

chat.name: Harrison
chat.message: Okay I don't see anything. Can I go now?

chat.name: Tyler
chat.message: Open the trash can.

chat.name: Harrison
chat.message: Dude no, please. I don't want any part of whatever this is.

chat.name: Tyler
chat.message: You wanna listen or do you want to be next?

chat.name: Harrison
chat.message: Oh that's disgusting man. I think I'm going to be sick. Is that him?

chat.name: Harrison
chat.message: Is that KP?

chat.name: Tyler
chat.message: Yeah...or at least it was...

chat.name: Harrison
chat.message: This is messed up. What do you want from me? What did you do to him?

chat.name: Tyler
chat.message: It's not what I did it's what you did.

chat.name: Harrison
chat.message: There's no way you're pinning this on me. I didn't touch him.

chat.name: Tyler
chat.message: You just touched the lid of the garbage can he's in. He's wearing your shirt. I'm no forensic scientists, but come on DNA

chat.name: Harrison
chat.message: I have these text! You are screwed in the head. What's wrong with you?

chat.name: Tyler
chat.message: Tell the truth and it'll all be over for you...you may even get your friend back.

chat.name: Harrison
chat.message: I didn't do this.

chat.name: Tyler
chat.message: I haven't told you what I want the truth about.

chat.name: Harrison
chat.message: What???

chat.name: Tyler
chat.message: You hooked up with April didn't you?

chat.name: Harrison
chat.message: Dude. That's what this is about?

chat.name: Tyler
chat.message: KP lied about it. I won't keep asking you. I want the truth.

chat.name: Harrison
chat.message: Okay yes! I did it and I was trying to play it off like it was you.

chat.name: Tyler
chat.message: That's unfortunate. Only I should be with my girlfriend.

chat.name: Harrison
chat.message: Jake? This is you isn't it? Dude it's not that serious. All this over some skirt?

chat.name: Tyler
chat.message: Go 10 steps back and look in the window.

chat.name: Harrison
chat.message: You killed Tyler!!!!

chat.name: Tyler
chat.message: And you're next.
